data: ANES/SURG Transfer Pain Management
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Notify Treating Provider
Notify Attending Service to review the ANES/SURG Transfer Pain Management PowerPlan
Attending Service To Manage Analgesia
Anesthesia Signing off. Attending Service responsible for all future analgesia orders
Patient Care
Notify Treating Provider
Notify attending provider if no bowel protocol ordered for patients while on PCA, epidural or other opioid therapy
